entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
The White House is facing an internal battle led by Jared Kushner over Trump's immigration EO. Expect it to be very watered down. Exemptions being discussed include refugees, H1B visas, and agricultural worker visas. 

More in @SpectatorUSA: 

https://t.co/kzmsW6A6Gm
